Room.Name: Thernardier's Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an alley behind Thernardier's Inn and leading to the stables.
Room.LongDescription: The Highland Stables is a rather nice place to board your horse, and they also rent horses to travellers coming out of the city. It really is an honest mistake when they rent your horse to some drunken lout who doesn't know how to treat a horse. The alley connects to Wakeforest Drive on the west.
